sentences.sCn: 最低价的特惠度假产品

sentences.sContent: Morale in the armed forces was at rock bottom.
sentences.sCn: 那时军队的士气处在最低谷。

trans.tranCn: 最低的， 最低水平的， 最低限度的
trans.tranOther: a rock-bottom price is as low as it can possibly be
If something has reached rock bottom, it is at such a low level that it cannot go any lower
